name: Plant! At the End of the World
name_original: Plant! At the End of the World
description:
Plant! At the End of the World is a side-scrolling platformer developed over the course of 10 days for GBJam 10.

Collect raindrops and save the last plant on earth from a polluted demise!

TIP: the game has an in-built death counter! Take a screenshot and show us your best run in the comments :)

(TIP #2: the death counter will reset at 30 deaths.)

Controls:

  • Tap the A button to float ("Z" on your keyboard in browser).
  • Use the left and right arrows to move.

Credits:

  • Amish Alvi - Programming, Design (Itch | Twitter)
  • Red Ahmed - Audio, Production (Itch | Twitter)
  • Robin Carnilius - Background and UI Art, Design, Production (Itch | Twitter)
  • Ryan Davis - Character and Asset Art (Itch | Twitter)
